full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SMAN BLA'I MDO CHOG GI SNYING PO'I CHOG SGRIGS RIN PO CHE'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @025A *, ,(GSAL BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI, RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I THUGS BSKYED SMON LAM GYI MTHU MDO CHOG GI SNYING PO 'DI LA THUGS DAM BYED PA MTHA' DBUS THAMS CAD DU KHYAB CING DAR CHA CHE YANG SBYOR BA'I SKOR RNAMS MDO CHOG LA ZHAL 'PHANGS MDZAD NAS, BLO GROS DMAN PA DAG GIS JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL MI SHES PA MANG DU SNANG BAS DE DAG LA PHAN DUD DE BA DANG, LHAG PAR BKRA SHIS PASMAGTAN GLING DU CHU LUG LO'I DBO ZLA BA'I TSES BRGYAD KYI NYIN THEG PA CHEN PO'I GSO SBYONG GI LDOM PA DANG BCAS SMAN BLA'I MDO CHOG GI SNYING 'DO 'DI GSAR DU BTZUG PA'I TSE, CHOG SGRIGS KHUNGS BTZUN 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES RANG GI SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,SMAN MDO BRGYAD BRGYA PA DANG, MKHAN CHEN ZHI BA 'TSO'I MDO CHOG DANG, MDO CHOG YID BZHIN DBANG RGYAL RNAMS LA ZHIB TU BRTAGS SHING, RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI DGONGS PA DANG MTHUN PAR BYAS TE, DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU BRIS, ,'DIS KYANG SNYIGS MA'I SKYE BO DAG LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
